title: Crispy Rosemary Chicken and Fries
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Watch Now

Place chicken and potatoes into a large bowl. Pour olive oil over them, and stir to coat. Scatter the chicken and potato pieces in a large baking dish, or cookie sheet with sides. Sprinkle with rosemary, oregano, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Watch Now
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, uncovered. Baste during the last 15 minutes for extra crispness. Watch Now
ingredients: 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
